transcript.title: SOLAR SAILOR
transcript.content:
I am delighted to announce that the Federal Government

will provide $1million for the Solar Sailor project.
This money will support the construction and demonstration

of a Catamaran powered by solar and wind energy with compressed natural

gas as back-up.
It will represent leading edge technology. The solar

wing uses energy from the sun or wind separately or in combination.
It represents the potential to travel on our waterways

and oceans in a clean, environmentally friendly manner.
Australia has a proud record of exporting leading edge

marine technology and Solar Sailor represents an exciting new direction.
The development of this technology is a credit to the

people involved and is the latest evidence of the innovation and potential

that exits in regional Australia. In this instance, the people of Ulladulla

and surrounding regions stand to reap the benefits of this exciting development.
The Federal Government is determined to promote the growth

of new and innovative industries in the regions. The money for the Solar

Sailor represents another step in this plan by helping to underpin an

exciting new industry in this region.
22 February 2000
